      • tryAccessibilityAnnounce

        public static void tryAccessibilityAnnounce(android.view.View view,
                                            java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Try to speak the specified text, for accessibility. Only available on JB or later.
        参数:
        text - Text to announce.

      • getPulseAnimator

        public static android.animation.ObjectAnimator getPulseAnimator(android.view.View labelToAnimate,
                                                                float decreaseRatio,
                                                                float increaseRatio)
        Render an animator to pulsate a view in place.
        参数:
        labelToAnimate - the view to pulsate.
        返回:
        The animator object. Use .start() to begin.

      • getAccentColorFromThemeIfAvailable

        public static int getAccentColorFromThemeIfAvailable(android.content.Context context)
        Gets the colorAccent from the current context, if possible/available
        参数:
        context - The context to use as reference for the color
        返回:
        the accent color of the current context

      • isDarkTheme

        public static boolean isDarkTheme(android.content.Context context,
                                  boolean current)
        Gets dialog type (Light/Dark) from current theme
        参数:
        context - The context to use as reference for the boolean
        current - Default value to return if cannot resolve the attribute
        返回:
        true if dark mode, false if light.
